attributes.action: Take action to stop citizens being exploited by premium rate phone scams.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Take action to stop citizens being exploited by premium rate phone scams.

Apart from legitimate companies charging their customers for phoning them, which in itself is a questionable policy, there are organisations whose  sole purpose is to entice unsuspecting citizens to "subscribe" to their services. Action is needed to regulate such use of premium rate services.
